title: From: Steve Jobs. "Great idea, thank you."
author: mattl
aiHeadline: Steve Jobs, in a shocking display of humility, thanks someone for a 'great idea'—could this be the plot twist we've all been waiting for?

title: Void: Open-source Cursor alternative
author: sharjeelsayed
aiHeadline: Void: The open-source editor that proves even in the digital age, sometimes you just need a good 'void' in your life.

title: My new deadline: 20 years to give away virtually all my wealth
author: nrvn
aiHeadline: Bill Gates sets a 20-year deadline to give away his fortune—because apparently, even billionaires need a deadline to be charitable.

title: First American pope elected and will be known as Pope Leo XIV
author: saikatsg
aiHeadline: First American pope elected, to be known as Pope Leo XIV—finally, the Vatican is getting with the times and realizing that not everyone is European.

title: Ask HN: What are good high-information density UIs (screenshots, apps, sites)?
author: troupo
